page.title: 08HOMES IN WEST EWELL contd.
page.content: Most of the cookers used are gas;a few are electric and two or three have gas hobs and electric ovens. Just over half the houses have two toilets;the others have one. Over half the houses have two children living in them,and just under half have three. Most of the flats in which our children live are between two and four storeys high. Half are made of brick and the others of concrete with flat roofs made of tiles or asphalt,and are around seventeen years old,built on the council estate mentioned earlier. Several of our children are Travellers and live on a permanent council caravan site with toilet blocks,and their own warden.
